articles.author: Nick Cawley
articles.title: US Dollar Hits a Fresh Multi-Month High, Gold Surge Continues Towards $2,400/oz - DailyFX
articles.description: The US dollar index opens higher in Europe, aided by a weak Euro, and is back at highs seen last November. Gold is unfazed by US dollar strength and continues to print new highs.
articles.content:
US Dollar and Gold Analysis and Charts
  • US dollar index hits a five-month high.
  • Gold eyes $2,400/oz. and higher.
